actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs, S. Rept. 93-457.

actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: An original bill to amend section 14(b) of the Federal Reserve Act, as amended, to extend for 8 months the authority of Federal Reserve banks to purchase United States obligations directly from the Treasury.

summary.text: Extends for eight months the authority of Federal Reserve banks, under the Federal Reserve Act, to purchase United States obligations directly from the Treasury. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 355)

titles.title: An original bill to amend section 14(b) of the Federal Reserve Act, as amended, to extend for 8 months the authority of Federal Reserve banks to purchase United States obligations directly from the Treasury.
